name: Hotel Mare

reviews.title: A nice quiet getaway
reviews.text: This hotel offers a quiet, peaceful location that would appeal to anyone not seeking shops, bars, clubs etc. For these you need to travel by car. The rooms are simple but comfortable, the pool sufficient and the location beautiful. It is the location that was its main attraction to me.
The only option, other than to travel, for eating is the hotel restaurant that offers a mixed and changing menu. The best deal might be the bed/breakfast/dinner option but this limited choice.
reviews.title: Wonderful warm and friendly service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The beach is small but is quiet. The view over the bat from rooms and the pool,is lovely. I'd recommend it if you need to unwind, want to just read a book and occasionally look up, admire the view and sip your Campari.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel but you need a car!

reviews.text: I have just spent several days at the Hotel Mare. What a wonderful experience. I felt as if I was staying with family and friends. The position of the Hotel is wonderful, overlooking the Magnificent Portoferraio town. The restuarant is too in an ideal setting just on the seafront . The food was delicious and I had half board and was excellent value plus the restaurant staff were so obliging.
reviews.title: Calm and Relaxing Retreat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I loved it so much that I am going back next week... Excellent value, ideal location and family run hotel.... Perfect for a quiet retreat away from the hustle and bustle of every day life.....
reviews.title: Quiet and excellent value for money

description: Hotel Mare stands in the old maritime village of Magazzini situated on the gulf of Portoferraio. Secluded from traffic and noise, it's the ideal spot for a relaxing seaside holiday. The Hotel has a private beach, pool with whirlpool, garden, solarium, restaurant with panoramic view . All rooms feature air conditionning, private terrace, satellite TV, minibar, safe and telephone with direct line. The marina gives guests an opportunity to discover nearby coves an beaches inaccessible from land, wich are quiet and enjoyable even in the high season.
